summary: Project includes an admin dashboard; current priority is fixing a production crash on the admin dashboard caused by React error 185 and improving defensive rendering/loading states around admin role data.
architectural_notes: Admin dashboard should defensively render: add null checks and safe loading states; do not render dashboard UI until admin role data is loaded/defined.
known_issues: Admin dashboard page crashes with React error 185 when opening admin page; likely due to undefined admin role data during render.

existing_features.title: Fix the Admin Dashboard page crash (Minified React error #185) by making AdminDashboardPage render-safe under all transient/invalid data conditions (undefined/null analytics object, missing fields, unexpected numeric values such as Infinity/NaN after bigint conversion).

Ensure admin role data is defined before rendering the AdminDashboardPage content by adding explicit safe loading/guard behavior tied to admin-role resolution (do not render dashboard analytics/cards until the admin role check has deterministically completed).

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix admin dashboard crash (React error 185) by adding null checks/safe loading states and ensuring admin role data is defined before rendering

projectName: Fix /admin dashboard crash (React error #185) with defensive rendering and role gating
